version_description:
- fix bugs for Sony TVs
- add yearly subscription option
- add ability to pause, seek... when casting video
- fix some crashes

- landscape mirroring
- memory optimization, mirroring games is now smoother
- bugfixes

Big update with a lot of improvements
- add ability to change screen orientation when mirroring
- add more options: optimized mirroring speed or optimized image quality
- add IPTV support
- UI improvements

- Auto-rotate orientation (You don't have to change orientation manually anymore).
- Improve mirroring speed
- Show progress bar when casting video
- Bugfixes and improvements

- Web Mirror: screen mirroring via web browser for some TVs don't work with Direct Mirror
- UI improvements
- Some bugfixes

- This update is dedicated for Web Mirror
+ Auto-rotation for Web Mirror
+ Add tutorial video for Web Mirror
+ By default, Web Mirror starts with highest quality
- Some other bugfixes and minor improvements

- Mirroring for Samsung TVs is now much easier, just one tap to start mirroring.
- Support full screen mode for Web Mirror
- Bugfixes

- Improvements for LG & Chromecast TVs
- Use small ad banner instead of large banner.
- Bug fixes

- improve mirroring performance for LG, Chromecast & Samsung TVs
- minor bug fixes
bug fixes and some updates in app's UI

- bugfixes for new Samsung TV
- UI improvements
